overview.en: Miner Zone is a new generation of decentralized Internet form, which is based on the data value sharing network based on block chain, artificial intelligence AI and VR technology to build a decentralized financial virtual reality industry ecosystem, enabling the real economy.
overview.zh: Miner Zone—去中心化的新一代互联网形态，是以区块链、人工智能AI、VR技术为基础的数据价值共用网络，构建去中心化的金融性虚拟现实产业圈生态，赋能实体经济。
